臥倒.definition: to lie down; to drop to the ground

臥床.definition: to lie in bed; bedridden; bed

臥底.definition: to hide (as an undercover agent); an insider (in a gang of thieves); a mole

臥房.definition: bedroom; a sleeping compartment (on a train)

臥槽.definition: (Internet slang) (substitute for 我肏[wo3 cao4]) fuck; WTF

臥艙.definition: sleeping cabin on a boat or train

臥草.definition: (substitute for 我肏[wo3 cao4]) fuck; WTF; (soccer) to waste time by feigning injury

臥薪嘗膽.definition: lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Goujian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1jian4], in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom); fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge

臥薪嚐膽.definition: variant of 臥薪嘗膽|卧薪尝胆[wo4xin1-chang2dan3]

臥虎.definition: crouching tiger; fig. major figure in hiding; concealed talent

臥虎藏龍.definition: lit. hidden dragon, crouching tiger (idiom); fig. talented individuals in hiding; concealed talent

臥蠶.definition: plump lower eyelids (considered to be an attractive feature)

臥軌.definition: to lie across the railway tracks (to commit suicide or to prevent trains from getting through)

臥鋪.definition: a bed (on a train); a couchette

臥龍.definition: sleeping dragon; (fig.) a person of outstanding talent who lives in obscurity

臥龍區.definition: Wolong district of Nanyang city 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan

臥龍大熊貓保護區.pinyin: Wo4 long2 Da4 xiong2 mao1 Bao3 hu4 qu1
臥龍大熊貓保護區.definition: Wolong Giant Panda Nature Reserve in Wenchuan county, northwest Sichuan

臥龍自然保護區.pinyin: Wo4 long2 Zi4 ran2 Bao3 hu4 qu1
臥龍自然保護區.definition: Wolong National Nature Reserve in Wenchuan county, northwest Sichuan, home of the giant panda 大熊貓|大熊猫[da4 xiong2 mao1]
